titles: The infallible true and assured vvitch: or, The second edition, of The tryall of witch-craft Shewing the right and true methode of the discouerie: with a confutation of erroneous vvayes, carefully reuiewed and more fully cleared and augmented. By Iohn Cotta, Doctor in Physicke.
author: Cotta, John, 1575?-1650?
publisher: Printed by I[ohn] L[egat] for Richard Higgenbotham, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Angel in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: A reissue, with cancel title page, of: The triall of witch-craft, 1624.
Running title reads: The triall of witch-craft, with the true discouerie thereof.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
